data.title: Unfriendly
data.text: Have you ever walked into a business where The employees act as though they are more important than the customers?? That was how my husband were treated at this establishment! We were the only people in the place and the woman at the counter taking are order seemed put off by us, perhaps because we wanted to split a wrap! So My husband ordered a salad he NEVER received and I had a wrap. The wrap was fine, but I must say I left with a BAD taste in my mouth!!

data.title: Fresh and flavorable
data.text: I travel a bit and when I am in different cities I like to try ethnic foods.  I found this place on trip advisor and was pleasantly surprised with my meal!  The atmosphere was clean and inviting.

user_location.name: Sioux Falls, South Dakota, United States

data.title: My favorite Greek spot!
data.text: I have been going to Terra for about 4 years now. I have never ordered anything that wasn't delicious! The owners know me by name and its authentic Greek cuisine! The best!

data.title: What a wonderful find!!
data.text: Really good food and good portions. You order at the counter and take a seat at one of the few tables in the back. Surprisingly cosmopolitan - unexpected in the area it is in. I had the veggie sampler; Hummus, tzatziki sauce, dolmathes, sliced cucumbers, greek olives, some feta and grilled pita wedges. The dolmathes were warm and melted in your mouth. The hummus was homemade and a huge portion. The tzatziki was homemade and wonderfully garlicky. I also had the Spanakopita - needless to say, I took home a lot of food. My friend had a special, the chicken kabob. It came with spiced rice and warm string beans cooked in a slightly spicy sauce. They're only open from 11 to 3pm..So get going!!

data.title: Original, Fresh, & Delicious
data.text: Without a doubt the best place to eat in Wilmington.  Food is natural and fresh, which is RARE wherever else you go. Environment is quaint and good for large groups of people. Felt very welcome here and enjoyed the food... would definitely come again.

data.title: Not your run-of-the-mill Greek Restaurant
data.text: Although a little over-priced, I strongly recommend trying new things from their menu. Its more then standard Greek. However, don't bother with the specials. They never post the prices and are often very expensive.

owner_response.author: terraofficial, Owner at Terra Cafe & Grille, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks Jim for taking the time to write a review for us! We really appreciate it and hope to see you back here soon!!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Authentic, delicious Greek cuisine
data.text: The food here is excellent, as is the service.  Very friendly.  Having traveled to Greece in the past year, I am always eager to find genuine, delicious Greek food that takes me back to our visit to Greece.  I love the convenience of the location, close to the business district and courthouse where  good meals are not easily found.  The only downside is the size of the establishment.  There is only a small seating area and it does not easily accommodate a business lunch with several people. Would love it if the restaurant would expand.  I'd be there much more frequently.

owner_response.author: terraofficial, Owner at Terra Cafe & Grille, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to write a review for us! We really appreciate it and hope to see you back here soon!!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Simple, non-pretentious, tasty, fresh
data.text: This is my second visit here for lunch and twice I have not been disappointed. Salads are fresh and lightly dressed, and every meal eaten by myself and my associates who have accompanied me have been tasty, fresh (nicely garlic laden!), well seasoned and non-greasy

data.title: Great Flavor!
data.text: This Greek owned family restaurant offers many homemade dishes including spanakopita, rice pudding & gyros! They offer great quality ingredients & the owners are very nice. If you are Downtown you must try Terra Cafe!

data.title: If you like Greek, you need Terra!
data.text: I've never had food from a real, live Grecian at their home, but if this food taste anything like that, I love authentic Greek food. The food is always delicious and the staff is always working hard. She (i'm assuming the owner) has been speedy, accurate, and polite every time ove visited Terra. Highly recommended! It's a gem!

owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to write a review for us! We really appreciate it and hope to see you back here soon!!

data.title: Крошечное кафе
data.text:
Планировал поужинать в этом заведении, но вечером оно оказалось закрыто. Внутри довольно тесно, меню обычное, в основном представлены традиционные американские блюда, на телятина на гриле не понравилась совсем.
В общем, ожидал более приятной атмосферы и более разнообразного меню.
